article_text: Given the national attention focused on Gov. Sam Brownback’s failed tax cuts in recent months, his State of the State address Thursday night could be the most important speech in recent Kansas history. Which brings us to the special Sam Brownback ‘State of the State drinking game.’

Sam Brownback’s failed tax cuts in recent months, his State of the State address Thursday night could be the most important speech in recent Kansas history.
Which brings us to the special Sam Brownback ‘State of the State drinking game.’
